instructions:
Remove skin from chicken thighs, debone, pound lightly and drizzle with lemon juice; dust with flour and
brown in melted butter. Place in baking dish; salt and pepper, and spread with mustard. Sauté onion and
mushrooms. Add parsley and blend in cream and gravy. Pour mixture over thighs and bake at 350 degrees
for 35 to 40 minutes. Serves 4.
ingredients: 3/8 cup half and half (or sour cream)
name: Chicken Dijon
creator: Jan Decker
